alert.note: Alert for Glascock; Jefferson; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Glascock, central Washington and central Jefferson Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Hebron, or 7 miles southwest of Sandersville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Sandersville, Louisville, Gibson, Wrens, Davisboro, Tennille, Stapleton, Oconee, Avera, Mitchell, Deepstep, Edge Hill, Edgehill, Downs, Warthen, Grange, Stapletons Crossroads, Agricola, Stellaville, and Hebron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
